{{Character | character name = Aunt Millie | image = Aunt Millie.jpg | ep = "[[The One With All The Cheesecakes]]" | number = 1 | actor = Darlene Kardon | name = Aunt Millie | gender = Female | relatives = [[Ross Geller]] (nephew)
[[Monica Geller]] (niece)
[[Ben Geller]] (great nephew)
[[Emma Geller-Greene]] (great-niece)
[[Jack Bing]] (adoptive great-nephew)
[[Erica Bing]] (adoptive great-niece) }} '''Millie''' is one of the [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s aunts. She was invited to [[Cousin Frannie|cousin Frannie]]'s wedding. She is the aunt of [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] and the great aunt to [[Emma Geller-Greene|Emma]], [[Ben Geller|Ben]], [[Jack Bing|Jack]] and [[Erica Bing|Erica]]. It's unclear what part of the Geller family she comes from. Aunt Millie always tries to kiss Ross on the lips which is what the latter tries to avoid when he's around her.
